coreAttributes.name: Tree Shoots Salad
coreAttributes.description: A plastic bag containing a somewhat bland-looking assortment of green leaves, stems, and shoots. On the reverse of the bag it proudly declares that it 'contains all the nutrients a deer needs', beside a picture of a naked deer-girl fondling her breasts.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot healthier...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the bag of Tree Shoots Salad and quickly [npc.verb(devour)] it, leaving [npc.herHim] with the refreshing, watery taste of green leaves filling [npc.her] mouth.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the bag of Tree Shoots Salad, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips] and getting [npc2.herHim] to eat it. Quickly devouring it, [npc2.name] is left with the refreshing, watery taste of green leaves filling [npc2.her] mouth.
